## Selected Projects

### Master's thesis - Auditory attention decoding (EEG & Audio)
- Finetuned [LaBraM](https://arxiv.org/abs/2405.18765) and [CLAP](https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.06687) to classify the attended speaker using a clinical dataset
- Implemented an audio-disjoint data splitting method to ensure no data leakage across clinical trials and subjects
